verses.plain: Hear therefore, O ye kings, and understand; learn, ye that be judges of the ends of the earth.

tokens.t: Hear therefore, O ye kings, and understand; learn, ye that be judges of the ends of the earth.

verses.plain: Give ear, ye that rule the people, and glory in the multitude of nations.

tokens.t: Give ear, ye that rule the people, and glory in the multitude of nations.

verses.plain: For power is given you of the Lord, and sovereignty from the Highest, who shall try your works, and search out your counsels.

tokens.t: For power is given you of the Lord, and sovereignty from the Highest, who shall try your works, and search out your counsels.

verses.plain: Because, being ministers of his kingdom, ye have not judged aright, nor kept the law, nor walked after the counsel of God;

tokens.t: Because, being ministers of his kingdom, ye have not judged aright, nor kept the law, nor walked after the counsel of God;

verses.plain: Horribly and speedily shall he come upon you: for a sharp judgment shall be to them that be in high places.

tokens.t: Horribly and speedily shall he come upon you: for a sharp judgment shall be to them that be in high places.

verses.plain: For mercy will soon pardon the meanest: but mighty men shall be mightily tormented.

tokens.t: For mercy will soon pardon the meanest: but mighty men shall be mightily tormented.

verses.plain: For he which is Lord over all shall fear no man’s person, neither shall he stand in awe of any man’s greatness: for he hath made the small and great, and careth for all alike.

tokens.t: For he which is Lord over all shall fear no man’s person, neither shall he stand in awe of any man’s greatness: for he hath made the small and great, and careth for all alike.

verses.plain: But a sore trial shall come upon the mighty.

tokens.t: But a sore trial shall come upon the mighty.

verses.plain: Unto you therefore, O kings, do I speak, that ye may learn wisdom, and not fall away.

tokens.t: Unto you therefore, O kings, do I speak, that ye may learn wisdom, and not fall away.

verses.plain: For they that keep holiness holily shall be judged holy: and they that have learned such things shall find what to answer.

tokens.t: For they that keep holiness holily shall be judged holy: and they that have learned such things shall find what to answer.

verses.plain: Wherefore set your affection upon my words; desire them, and ye shall be instructed.

tokens.t: Wherefore set your affection upon my words; desire them, and ye shall be instructed.

verses.plain: Wisdom is glorious, and never fadeth away: yea, she is easily seen of them that love her, and found of such as seek her.

tokens.t: Wisdom is glorious, and never fadeth away: yea, she is easily seen of them that love her, and found of such as seek her.

verses.plain: She preventeth them that desire her, in making herself first known unto them.

tokens.t: She preventeth them that desire her, in making herself first known unto them.

verses.plain: Whoso seeketh her early shall have no great travail: for he shall find her sitting at his doors.

tokens.t: Whoso seeketh her early shall have no great travail: for he shall find her sitting at his doors.

verses.plain: To think therefore upon her is perfection of wisdom: and whoso watcheth for her shall quickly be without care.

tokens.t: To think therefore upon her is perfection of wisdom: and whoso watcheth for her shall quickly be without care.

verses.plain: For she goeth about seeking such as are worthy of her, sheweth herself favourably unto them in the ways, and meeteth them in every thought.

tokens.t: For she goeth about seeking such as are worthy of her, sheweth herself favourably unto them in the ways, and meeteth them in every thought.

verses.plain: For the very true beginning of her is the desire of discipline; and the care of discipline is love;

tokens.t: For the very true beginning of her is the desire of discipline; and the care of discipline is love;

verses.plain: And love is the keeping of her laws; and the giving heed unto her laws is the assurance of incorruption;

tokens.t: And love is the keeping of her laws; and the giving heed unto her laws is the assurance of incorruption;

verses.plain: And incorruption maketh us near unto God:

tokens.t: And incorruption maketh us near unto God:

verses.plain: Therefore the desire of wisdom bringeth to a kingdom.

tokens.t: Therefore the desire of wisdom bringeth to a kingdom.

verses.plain: If your delight be then in thrones and sceptres, O ye kings of the people, honour wisdom, that ye may reign for evermore.

tokens.t: If your delight be then in thrones and sceptres, O ye kings of the people, honour wisdom, that ye may reign for evermore.

verses.plain: As for wisdom, what she is, and how she came up, I will tell you, and will not hide mysteries from you: but will seek her out from the beginning of her nativity, and bring the knowledge of her into light, and will not pass over the truth.

tokens.t: As for wisdom, what she is, and how she came up, I will tell you, and will not hide mysteries from you: but will seek her out from the beginning of her nativity, and bring the knowledge of her into light, and will not pass over the truth.

verses.plain: Neither will I go with consuming envy; for such a man shall have no fellowship with wisdom.

tokens.t: Neither will I go with consuming envy; for such a man shall have no fellowship with wisdom.

verses.plain: But the multitude of the wise is the welfare of the world: and a wise king is the upholding of the people.

tokens.t: But the multitude of the wise is the welfare of the world: and a wise king is the upholding of the people.

verses.plain: Receive therefore instruction through my words, and it shall do you good.

tokens.t: Receive therefore instruction through my words, and it shall do you good.
